scripts.tsconfig:prepack: cp tsconfig.json tsconfig.prepack.json; node -e 'const pjson=require(`./tsconfig.json`); pjson.compilerOptions.baseUrl=`../../..`; pjson.compilerOptions.outDir=`${pjson.compilerOptions.baseUrl}/build`; delete pjson.compilerOptions.paths; pjson.include=pjson.include.map(s=>`../${s}`); require(`fs`).writeFileSync(`tsconfig.json`, JSON.stringify(pjson, undefined, 2))'
scripts.prepack: npm run tsconfig:prepack; rm -rf build && mkdir build && tar -C ../../build/packages/$(basename `pwd`)/src --exclude tsconfig.json --exclude test --exclude node_modules -cf - . | tar -C build -xf - && find build -type l -exec rm {} \; && cp -a build/* . && chmod +x kui-dist-init.js
scripts.postpack: npm run tsconfig:postpack; for i in build/*; do rm -rf ./`basename $i`; done
